text: it's a little bit addictive to watch but
even though we've all kind of seen it
before
there's just something satisfying about
watching them tumble over and over and
over again
Belgian Reading Association book PE
enlisted the help of 40 volunteers to
painstakingly craft an elaborate chain
through the Antwerp Book Fair 4845 books
smoothly felled spelling the Dutch words
for Book Fair and read the point of it
well to break the world record in the
longest book Domino chain the current
one stands at nearly three thousand
books set in South Africa but organizers
say it's also to encourage reading and
celebrate books the 614 metre long chain
took six minutes to complete ending in a
bang crowds delighted organisers later
try to break their own record with five
thousand and five foot but there was a
slight chunk in the chain Caterina mo
